Minecraft is a 2011 sandbox game developed and published by the Swedish video game developer Mojang Studios.

patterns: Who is the creator of Minecraft
responses: Markus Persson, known as Notch, is the Swedish programmer behind Minecraft.

patterns: When was the official 1.0 release of Minecraft
responses: The first public version of Minecraft was in may 2009, and it's official 1.0 release was in november 2011.
The last version of Minecraft is currently (01/06/2025) the 1.21.5 .
The biggest Minecraft server, with more than 50000 daily players and a record at 216000, is Hypixel.
